Articles.Content:
Hey

During flight in map mode, if you go to the top center of your screen that lets you select what type of craft should be displayed. I.e. Lander or Probe or Ship etc..

How do I select multiple types at once? In my current scenario I need Probes and Debris to be displayed at the same time.

Also How to I get back to the default mod? The one that displays everything but Debris?

Or how do I make the Map display everything including Debris?

Thank you!
I believe you right-click on the icons to select multiple.

funny how I was absolutely convinced I had tried that...

Thank you for the prompt answer you have helped me a lot.
